**HELP**
***BOT COMMANDS***
```
training                       <training [@HostsName]
over                           <over [@HostsName]
cancelled                      <cancelled
help                           <help
purge                          <purge [ammount]  (Only work for messages under 14 days old)
[Min messages to delete(in one command): 2 Max messages to delete(in one command): 100
```
